/ContextUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x963ea7f0b48b032eef72fe3a7582edf78408d6f834115b9feadd673a4d5bd149","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d6520943ea55fdf5f0bafb39ed909f64de17051bc954ff3e88c9e5621412c79c","dweb:/ipfs/QmWZ4rAKTQbNG2HxGs46AcTXShsVytKeLs7CUCdCSv5N7a"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/utils/StringsUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6b9a5d35b744b25529a2856a8093e7c03fb35a34b1c4fb5499e560f8ade140da","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://187b5c3a1c9e77678732a2cc5284237f9cfca6bc28ee8bc0a0f4f951d7b3a2f8","dweb:/ipfs/Qmb2KFr7WuQu7btdCiftQG64vTzrG4UyzVmo53EYHcnHYA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/utils/introspection/ERC165Upgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9a3b990bd56d139df3e454a9edf1c64668530b5a77fc32eb063bc206f958274a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0895399d170daab2d69b4c43a0202e5a07f2e67a93b26e3354dcbedb062232f7","dweb:/ipfs/QmUM1VH3XDk559Dsgh4QPvupr3YVKjz87HrSyYzzVFZbxw"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165Upgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc6cef87559d0aeffdf0a99803de655938a7779ec0a3cd5d4383483ad85565a09","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://92ad7e572cf44e6b4b37631b44b62f9eb9fb1cf14d9ce51c1504d5dc7ccaf758","dweb:/ipfs/QmcnbqX85tsWnUXPmtuPLE4SczME2sJaTfmqEFkuAJvWhy"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/utils/math/MathUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc1bd5b53319c68f84e3becd75694d941e8f4be94049903232cd8bc7c535aaa5a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://056027a78e6f4b78a39be530983551651ee5a052e786ca2c1c6a3bb1222b03b4","dweb:/ipfs/QmXRUpywAqNwAfXS89vrtiE2THRM9dX9pQ4QxAkV1Wx9kt"]},"src/PebbleDelagateVerificationManager/DelagateVerificationInternals.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0a2fa8bd1208c24760cb21e7a2ff52d86b39949c48ea9afcd019a313b1675cf4","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://7250ab6b6227d83d6a4804edc1183b729f4fb2b69d22509f84b872618f329b7d","dweb:/ipfs/QmWHWTUZsWmBRJJGQXPnbsMP5E9wTjy6pseGVBbEcacnwn"]},"src/PebbleDelagateVerificationManager/PebbleDelagateVerificationManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5135ecc285067dc968fecc97ded7dda0ddb6d1f7cd2e977f92bc580aa1040ee5","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://4c8a37d1756ba715ed6b181e97b54391338c79c24d15d7f872b982de213ccc92","dweb:/ipfs/Qmbo916R8BPSdA1QVZTZZzTxYmH3LAbJgz6N3J6nJuffLq"]},"src/PebbleRoleManager/PebbleRoleManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8f098e452dede72e5f8c1bd36bdf2073cf5d69f2dfdd1242d0f7bbe32005d247","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://f24cb8639171fbb64bbc768d55405c386afa0d8ff41dc5e3af789722edce3b4d","dweb:/ipfs/QmV6pdkLQT56FDmbc3zPT2z3tUguwwQYopb1gNQxs96ADJ"]}},"version":1}

getDelegatorNonce(address).details: Gets a delegator's next allowed nonceDelegators must use this to sign anything

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantPebbleAdminRole(address).details: Grants Pebble admin role to an addressCan only be called by Role admin of Pebble admin role, for obvious reasons

params._pebbleAdminNew: New address to be granted Pebble admin role

grantPebbleDelegateeRole(address).details: Grants Pebble Delegatee role to an addressCan only be called by Role admin of Delegatee role, for obvious reasons

params._delegateeNew: New address to be granted Delegatee role

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokePebbleAdminRole(address).details: Revokes Pebble admin role from an addressCan only be called by Role admin of Pebble admin role, for obvious reasons

params._pebbleAdminToRevoke: Pebble admin role holder to revoke

revokePebbleDelegateeRole(address).details: Revokes Delegatee role from an addressCan only be called by Role admin of Delegatee role, for obvious reasons

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.
